function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate building design for occupant health","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Implementing building design features that prioritize occupant health, such as ventilation systems, natural lighting, and sustainable materials","Technologies":"Sustainable building materials, advanced HVAC systems, air quality sensors","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, architects, designers","Owner":"Architects, designers, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of occupant-centric building operation modules","Impact":"Inefficient building operations and increased energy consumption","Mitigation":"Implementing occupant-centric building operation modules, using smart building technologies for energy optimization, and providing occupant education on sustainable practices","Technologies":"Smart building automation systems, energy management software, occupant feedback systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, energy managers","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Insufficient influence of facility managers on building health","Impact":"Limited ability to improve building health and occupant well-being","Mitigation":"Empowering facility managers with training on occupant health, involving them in the building design process, and providing them with resources to implement health-promoting strategies","Technologies":"Occupant health assessment tools, occupant feedback systems, training programs","People":"Facility managers, building occupants, building owners","Owner":"Building owners"}]}
